text: Cadole is a village in Flintshire, Wales; the name was originally Cat hole or Cathole and the village was known as this in living memory. It lies west of Gwernymynydd and Mold (Yr Wyddgrug), south of Gwernaffield and to the east of the Clwydian Range, an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. == References == == External links == *Photos of Cadole and surrounding area on geograph.org.uk Category:Villages in Flintshire
title: Cadole
